comments.author: soma.kelemen@polaris-n.hu
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #3)
> The ispbd isn't connected yet to the production db.
> 
> Soma are you the person responsible at polaris-n ?

Yes I am.

Yes I do, but i would use https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Thunderbird/Autoconfiguration#Mechanisms
"4. look up "MX example.com" in DNS, and for mx1.mail.hoster.com, look up "hoster.com" in the ISPDB" because we have many domain with mx0.polaris-n.hu mx record.
comments.text:
